name: Escape From Them
description:
Flee your mysterious captors! 

This is a short interactive fiction piece meant to demonstrate a basic branching story to beginners. I wrote it as a demo for a local radio interview I did in 2015 after I wrote an article introducing Twine to a general audience. But anyone with half a minute to spare who craves a mild sense of dread can enjoy this game!

Source file provided if you want to see the story's inner workings. It's a .tws file that works in Twine 1.4.2 (the older version of Twine). Download Twine here.
